event.name: workspace_enter
event.description: This event is emitted whenever the toplevel enters a new workspace.

event.name: workspace_leave
event.description: This event is emitted whenever the toplevel leaves a workspace.

request.name: enter_workspace

description.summary: requests that the toplevel enter the given workspace

request.description: Requests that the toplevel enters the given workspace. If the toplevel enters the workspace is indicated by the workspace_enter event.

request.name: leave_workspace

description.summary: requests that the toplevel leave the given workspace

request.description: Requests that the toplevel leaves the given workspace. If the toplevel leaves the workspace is indicated by the workspace_enter event.
